com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.dialogs.handler

Interface SummaryElementHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CanEnable, CaptionHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SummaryElementHandlerAdapter, SummaryElementHandlerAdapter

    public interface SummaryElementHandler
extends CaptionHandler
    The interface SummaryElementHandler is used for the elements of the Report summaries. They may be enabled , they have a dedicated color and they may have a link. This interface extends CaptionHandler rather than delegating to an CaptionHandler object, because L10N only recognizes CaptionHandler objects.
